TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit TextElementEditingBehaviorAttribute extends System.Attribute
Public NotInheritable Class TextElementEditingBehaviorAttribute Inherits Attribute
public ref class TextElementEditingBehaviorAttribute sealed : Attribute

summary.span: 指定 應如何處理自訂文字項目。

span.span: Specifies how a should handle a custom text element.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 當您建立自訂文字項目時，您可以使用屬性來指定項目應該視為單一的 unbreakable 實體。When you create a custom text element, you can use the attribute to specify that the element should be treated as a single, unbreakable entity. 當和屬性會設為`false`，則保留界限和項目的內容，當使用者編輯。When the and properties are set to `false`, a preserves the boundaries and content of the element when the user edits the . 一般情況下，自訂的項目行為類似。In general, the custom element behaves similar to a . 當您使用這個類別，並將其屬性，以兩個設定，會發生下列行為`false`:The following behavior occurs when you use this class and set both of its properties to `false`: - 當使用者複製，並以自訂的項目貼上內容的一部分時，不保留複製的文字的格式。When a user copies and pastes a part of the content in a custom element, the formatting of the copied text is not preserved. - 當使用者輸入自訂的項目內容的前後時，新的內容不會取得自訂項目的格式化資訊。When a user types before or after the content of the custom element, the new content does not acquire the custom element's formatting information. - 使用者無法在自訂的項目中插入分行符號。The user cannot insert a line break in the custom element. 當您建立自訂的項目時，使用方法和 set`preserveTextElements`到`true`保留自訂的項目和屬性值，當您序列化至磁碟或剪貼簿。When you create a custom element, use the method and set `preserveTextElements` to `true` to preserve the custom element and property values when you serialize it to the disk or clipboard. .NET Framework 3.5 版中引進。 is introduced in the .NET Framework version 3.5. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[版本和相依性](~/docs/framework/migration-guide/versions-and-dependencies.md)。For more information, see [Versions and Dependencies](~/docs/framework/migration-guide/versions-and-dependencies.md).

summary.span: 取得或設定值，這個值表示 是否會合併兩個相鄰的文字項目。

span.span: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the can merge two adjacent text elements.

value.span: 如果 可以自由合併具有相同屬性值的相鄰自訂文字項目，則為 ，否則為 。

span.span: if a is free to merge adjacent custom text elements that have identical property values; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 當已`true`，決定是否来合併具有相同屬性值的相鄰的文字項目會保留最多。When is `true`, the decision to combine adjacent text elements that have identical property values is left up to the . 當已`false`、不能合併兩個相鄰的文字項目。When is `false`, a does not combine two adjacent text elements. .NET Framework 3.5 版中引進。 is introduced in the .NET Framework version 3.5. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[版本和相依性](~/docs/framework/migration-guide/versions-and-dependencies.md)。For more information, see [Versions and Dependencies](~/docs/framework/migration-guide/versions-and-dependencies.md).

summary.span: 取得或設定值，這個值表示文字項目會以字元為基礎來提供格式化，還是在整個項目上套用格式化。

span.span: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the text element provides formatting on a character basis, or if the formatting applies to the entire element.

value.span: 如果格式化應套用至個別字元，則為 ，如果格式化應套用至整個項目，則為 。

span.span: if formatting should apply to the individual characters; if the formatting should apply to the entire element.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 當是`true`和使用者複製及貼上自訂文字項目內容的一部分，格式會保留。When is `true` and the user copies and pastes part of the content of a custom text element, the formatting is preserved. 當是`false`，只有當使用者複製及貼上的所有自訂文字項目內容的格式會保留。When is `false`, the formatting is preserved only if the user copies and pastes all of the content of the custom text element. .NET Framework 3.5 版中引進。 is introduced in the .NET Framework version 3.5. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[版本和相依性](~/docs/framework/migration-guide/versions-and-dependencies.md)。For more information, see [Versions and Dependencies](~/docs/framework/migration-guide/versions-and-dependencies.md).
